Can you retry this with the released version of eclipse 3.0?  I was able to 
install CDT M9, and all later builds on eclipse 3.0 without getting this 
error.  I will mark this as fixed -- but feel free to re-open it if it is still 
occuring for you.

There were a lot of changes post-M8 to the plugin loading mechanism. I do not 
think this is a problem any longer. The user has Eclipse isntalled in Program 
Files, which may have caused the loader some grief, but this works for me too. 
I cannot duplicate this with a celan install.
